title: Clown with Cigarettes
description: The image shows a small group of people gathered on a patio with a brick backdrop. A person in a clown costume with bright red hair and a polka-dot outfit stands alongside a woman in a patterned blouse. Seated in the foreground and background are several children and adults, some wearing casual attire. The clown has a pack of smokes. He doesn't get paid enough for this shit.
